metadata.explanation: By the factor theorem, (x - 3) is a factor of ùëì(x) if and only if ùëì(3) = 0. Calculate ùëì(3) = 3¬≤ + 0(3) + -9 = 9 + 0 + -9 = 0. Therefore (x - 3) is a factor.
